channel.title: Source log help
channel.description: Hello i'm trying to download a source i have project fubergen client but whenever i download a source and make a account it says character not found and logs me out.... can you help???

item.title: Source log help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

try going on the character files and making your own character. Copy the codes from the other character files into yours.
put this:

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = (((your username)))
character-password = (((your password)))

copy the rest from the other character files.

take this if you have no other files, this is my character. Put a space ontop of every other category. Example:

character-item = 27 386 1

[BANK]

here is the code

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3088
character-posy = 3497
character-rights = 3
character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1
character-special = 100
character-tz = -1
character-starter = 1
character-pouch1 = 0
character-pouch2 = 0
character-pouch3 = 0
character-pouch4 = 0
character-energy = 92
character-taskID = -1

character-jad = 0

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0	2526	1

[LOOK]
